item.title: 100 errors, no idea whats this about
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

Tried it like u told me, not in 1 line it gave the same error. But when i removed the || (playerRights == 3) it didn’t??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 08:36:23 AM[/size][hr]Changed it to:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("b")) { if (absY < 3521) { openUpBank(); } else if (playerRights == 3) { openUpBank(); } else { sendMessage("You cannot bank in the wilderness!"); } }
And no errors

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("b") && playerRights >= 3) {if (absY >= 3521) {sendMessage("You cannot bank in wilderness!");} else {openUpBank(); }

item.title: 100 errors, no idea whats this about
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

So i got 100 errors, only changed the “b” command to be like what it is now:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("e") && playerRights == 3) {removeAllItems(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("b")) {if (absY <= 3520) || (playerRights == 3) {openUpBank();} else {sendMessage("You cannot bank in the wilderness!"); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("m") && playerRights >= 0) {addItem(995, 2000000000);And of course i dont have backup :S

Any ideas? Or is that fine and the error is somewhere else?
